Abstract: Range of influential experts offer ideas on kinds of institutions that ought to be established in New York City in 21st century (S)
Snippet: Range of influential experts offer ideas on kinds of institutions that ought to be established in New York City in 21st century (S)
LeadParagraph: For anyone who thinks New York City institutions never die, there is one word: vaudeville. Vaudeville bombed with the advent of radio and television, proving that even dancing girls and the old soft shoe can't save an institution whose time has passed.

Headline.Main: Manifestoes To Give City A New Edge
Headline.PrintHeadline: VISIONS: CITIES; Manifestoes To Give City A New Edge
